pages.text: Hi there! Unfortunately, as this release of Geolosys is a beta, this feature isn't quite in yet. I'm currently waiting to see if I can have a feature added in Patchouli to do this, but until then this is just here to let you know! You can keep up with this feature addition $(l:https://github.com/Vazkii/Patchouli/issues/333)here!$(/l)
